loginDescription: Shyiramo amakuru yawe kugira ngo ubashe kwinjira mu rubuga rw'ubuyobozi.
registerDescription: Fungura konti nshya y'umuyobozi ukoresheje kode y'ibanga.
userProfileDescription: Genzura amakuru ya konti yawe. (Kureba gusa kuri verisiyo yoroheje)
passMarkDescription: Iri ntego (50) rikoreshwa muri sisitemu yose mu kugenya niba umunyeshuri yatsinze cyangwa yatsinzwe mu manota no muri raporo.
themeDescription: Uburyo bw'umwijima bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe agashushanyo k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe w'porogaramu.
notificationsDescription: Imenyesha ry'amakuru kuri email ku bikorwa bya sisitemu riteganyijwe mu gihe kizaza kandi ntiriraboneka ubu.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Imikorere ihambaye nko kohereza amakuru muri PDF/Excel ku bwoko bwose bwa raporo, igenamigambi rya raporo ku buryo burambuye, n'igenamigambi ry'uburyo bwo gutumanaho (urugero: SMS/email) biteganyijwe mu ma verisiyo azaza ya Report-Manager Lite. Amahitamo ariho ubu yo "Kohereza nka CSV" atanga uburyo bw'ibanze bwo gukuramo amakuru.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo ufite uburenganzira bwo guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shyiraho amagenamiterere rusange ya sisitemu n'amakuru y'ishuri.
languageSettingsDescription: Hitamo ururimi ukunda rwo kwerekana muri porogaramu.
platformGoalEN: A smart education platform for managing student grades, attendance, and communication with parents — making the teacher’s work easier and more effective.
platformGoalRW: Urubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rufasha mu gucunga amanota y’abanyeshuri, imyitwarire, no gutumanaho n’ababyeyi — koroshya akazi k’umwarimu.
platformGoalFR: Une plateforme intelligente pour gérer les notes, la présence des élèves et communiquer avec les parents — facilitant le travail des enseignants.
featureGradeManagementDesc: Bika kandi wandike amanota y'abanyeshuri mu buryo bwiza.
featureSmsEmailDesc: Ohereza amanota n'amakuru mashya ku babyeyi (hakoreshejwe SMS/Email mu gihe kizaza).
featureAttendanceBehaviorDesc: Kurikirana imyitwarire y'abanyeshuri n'uburyo bitabira amasomo.
featurePhotosDocumentsDesc: Bika amafoto cyangwa inyandiko z'ingenzi z'abanyeshuri.
featureCommunicationDesc: Koroshya itumanaho hagati y'abarimu n'ubuyobozi bw'ishuri.
